author: samwilsn
content:
So we have our beefy machine for CI! I have akula set up on it.

I'm looking into options for what CI/build server to use.

I've personally used [Jenkins] and [Buildbot] before, and they're both fine.

I'm also looking into [Woodpecker].

So far I'm leaning towards Woodpecker, but since it uses Docker, I'm concerned about build processes having root permissions.

[Jenkins]: https://www.jenkins.io/
[Buildbot]: https://buildbot.net/
[Woodpecker]: https://woodpecker-ci.org/

author: parithosh
content: Github also allows you to add your own runners to a repository or organization. So you could use github actions with your build server and stay within the github ecosystem (if that's preferred of course).
